definition: To emphasize or highlight a specific part of a written or printed text, typically by drawing a line underneath it. This action is commonly employed to draw attention to important information or to mark key points in a document.

examples.english: I want to underline the text.

examples.german: Bitte unterstreichen Sie den wichtigen Absatz.
Kannst du mir zeigen, wie man Wörter unterstreicht?
examples.english: Can you show me how to underline words?

examples.german: Der Lehrer hat die Fehler im Text unterstrichen.
examples.english: The teacher underlined the mistakes in the text.

examples.german: Unterstreiche den Satz, um ihn hervorzuheben.
examples.english: Underline the sentence to highlight it.
